LaundryStepsComponent.firstStep: First step is creating an order once you create an order one of our drivers will be reaching your location to pickup your things
LaundryStepsComponent.secondStep: Second step our laundry service provider will recieve your order and start doing his work and we will inform you about price changes depending on the order weight
LaundryStepsComponent.thirdStep: Final step once your order is ready one of our drivers will pickup the order from the laundry and get it to your location as soon as possible

LocationPermissionScreen.askForNotif: The app collects your location Data to match you with the best rides and share your location with customers, even when the app is in background.
LocationPermissionScreen.locationPermissionDenied: Oops, Sadly without location permissions you can not use our application!
LocationPermissionScreen.locationPermissionDeniedForever: Location permissions are denied forever! Please change that.

locationPermissionStatus.denied: Access to your location is denied :(
locationPermissionStatus.backgroundAccessDenied: Access to background location is denied :(
locationPermissionStatus.foreverDenied: Click the button then go to permissions->location and check `Always`
locationPermissionStatus.serviceOff: Phone's Location service is disabled / off :(

ios.foreground: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `Keep Only While Using` .
ios.background: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please change the location permissions on App's Settings to `Always Allow` .

foreground.android9: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `Allow` .
foreground.android10: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `KEEP AND DON'T ASK AGAIN` .
foreground.android11: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `WHILE USING THE APP` .

background.android9: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click  `Allow` .
background.android10: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click `ALLOW ALL THE TIME` .
background.android11: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click Give Permissions -> Permissions -> Location -> All the time.
